metadata.title: We Opsy
metadata.defaultTitle: We Opsy - Multi-Currency Accounts & International Transfers
metadata.description: Open multi-currency accounts for personal or business use, send and receive money globally, and manage your finances with ease. Join WeOpsy today!
metadata.keywords: WeOpsy, multi-currency accounts, online payments, international transfers, currency exchange, online banking, business banking, fintech, IBAN account

navigation.businessInfo: Opsy is regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority as an Authorised Payment Institution since 15.06.2020, Firm Reference 917823, Company number 10063965, registered at Baldock Industrial Estate London Road, Office 10, AJS House, Units 11-12, Baldock, England, SG7 6NG, incorporated on 15.03.2016.

featuresSection.description: Spend, save and manage your money.

pricesSection.title: Prices
pricesSection.description: Affordable financial solutions for any personal and business. Find out where your business fits with Opsy below.

personal.title: No maintance fee
personal.subtitle: Individuals
personal.description: Get a 360-degree view and full control of your business finances. Send payments, manage funds, and exchange or hold different currencies.

business.title: No maintance fee
business.subtitle: Lower-risk businesses
business.description: Available to lowerrisk businesses that are not based in countries or territories that are listed among our Special Jurisdictions.
